name: Kirsten F. Cater
content: Home page of Dr. Kirsten Cater [ Bristol CS | Index ] Dr. Kirsten Cater I am a Reader in Computer Science at the University of Bristol. Please go to the Faculty of Engineering People page here to find out more about my teaching and research interests. Research Information Undergraduate and Postgraduate Projects The Bristol Interaction Group Pervasive Media Studio, A Centre of excellence in the DBERR's 2008 report "Creative Britain: New Talents for the New Economy" - 2008 I am one of the three Co-Directors of the Pervasive Media Studio, taking the executive decisions on behalf of the University of Bristol, to create an innovation hub to help encourage and support both research and lifelong learning in pervasive media for academics, those in technology and creative industries and the general public. The Studio is a three way partnership between the University of Bristol, the University of West of England, and the Watershed. Graphics Research
